name: HyperJunkie
description:
Hyper Junkie is a first-person competitive parkour runner featuring smooth and buttery game mechanics. The story follows a business man getting high on Mind Alternating Substances (MASS) as he wall runs, jumps, and climbs his way across the night city.

Made by RealSkinGames, a team made out of First Year AIE Students that strives to make the best games possible with a creative and fun aspect to it.

 Team Members consist of:

  • Lukasz Dziedziczak (Producer)
  • Matthew Watkins (Lead Game Designer)
  • Jason Anderson  (Lead Programmer)
  • Jackson Smith (Lead Artist)
  • Tyler Willis (Artist)
  • Maia Evele'Neill (Artist)
  • Daniel Hor (Designer)
